result.execSummary:
The defendant Britt I. Campbell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).
  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Britt I. Campbell in court with attorney Enku Edgar Lin.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24 is in trial.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Britt I. Campbell in court.   appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Case is adjourned for return on bench warrant in Branch 24.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Enku Edgar Lin in court previously.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Britt I. Campbell in court with attorney Greg Rendend for Enku Edgar Lin.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Case was calendared for motion hearing but defense counsel advised the clerk prior that a motion date was not needed.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Attorney Lin advised the clerk and ADA Gabler, via email, that he is withdrawing his motion that's set for August 20, 2015 at 3:00 pm.

Defendant Britt I. Campbell in court with attorney Grabiele Leija for Enku Edgar Lin with student intern Cameron Weitzner.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense requested a motion hearing date.  Defense motion is due by April 20, 2015.  Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 24.  Motion hearing scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription AND no drug paraphernalia.
  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Britt I. Campbell in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Defendant Britt I. Campbell in custody.  Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
